heading: Today
text: Morning clouds, along with a few stray showers. Clouds breaking for some sun through NY and the St. Lawrence Valley, reaching western VT late. Highs in the 50s to low 60s. Winds variable to north less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing south, and mostly clear north this evening, then increasing clouds later tonight. Lows in the upper 30s to low 40s. Winds light, becoming northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph toward morning.

heading: Wednesday
text: Periods of morning clouds, a few isolated mountain showers, then increasing sunshine. Clouds lingering through northern Green and White Mountains. Blustery and cool. Highs from the upper 40s to mid 50s north to south. Northwest winds becoming north 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph.
